gameplay.gameobject.powerups.Powerup

    Package Description
    gameplay.gameobject.powerups

    • Uses of Powerup in gameplay.gameobject.powerups

      Classes in gameplay.gameobject.powerups that implement Powerup 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BombPassPowerup
      BombPass powerup which allows bomberman to move through bombs.
      class  BombPowerup
      Bomb powerup which allows bomberman to place additional bombs.
      class  DetonatorPowerup
      Powerup which allows bomberman to detonate bombs.
      class  Door
      Class implementing the door object.
      class  FlamePassPowerup
      Powerup which makes bomberman immune to fire.
      class  FlamePowerup
      Powerup which increase the explosion radius of bombs.
      class  SpeedPowerup
      Powerup which increase the movement speed of bomberman.
      class  WallPassPowerup
      Powerup which allows bomberman to move through walls.

    • Uses of Powerup in gameplay.world

      Methods in gameplay.world that return Powerup 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Powerup Factory.getPowerup(Level level)
      Creates a powerup instance for the given level.
